channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Tech Now
channel.desc: Ione Wells explores how tech is helping Chile's kidnapped children trace their birth families decades after they were stolen. Alasdair Keane meets the Rotterdam start-up producing a greener alternative to cement. Plus, can AI clone you? Marc Cieslak puts a digital clone system to the test. And Nick Kwek takes a journey through the latest digital art projects at SXSW London.
